description:
This shirt features three chest pockets with flap and button closures, offering ample space for carrying your essentials in the forest. It includes a hidden accessory loop for convenient tool attachment.

With adjustable buttons at the cuffs, you can regulate the warmth to your preference. While essential for hunting, this shirt is also stylish and comfortable, perfect for cool seasons in town or at the cottage.
name: Hooke Adventure Shirt - Mens
